Rangala is situated in knuckles forest reservation near kotta ganga. Journey is starting with scenic tea plantations and ended on a hillside plateau. It is one of the most favorite destinations of Sri Lankan and foreign hikers. Hilltop is compatible for camping. Beyond forest is make a place for many days of wild trekking. But it's enough one or two days to reach to the first hilltop. If you are a nature lover or a hiker, few words are enough to describe the place
There are two main access roads to visit this place. One of them is from Kandy city via Tannekumbura city and Digana city km. After 21, you should come to Theldeniya city first. From there, you should travel 200 m on the road leading to Mahiyangana and then move forward on the Rangala road that runs to the left. Thus, while traveling on the Rangala road from Theldeniya city, first of all, km from Theldeniya city. After 04 km, the road leading to the left of Udispatttu town is another km. 08 after going forward, at the Elagolla junction, pass the Dakwari Tea Industry hall, go ahead 200 m and then turn to the Galabadawatta road running to the left.
From there another km. This place can be easily reached by traveling 02.
Also, the other way to access this place is from Kandy city via Katugastota city and Madawala city. After 22 km you should come to Panwila city. Gomer must be reached by traveling 26 km. This place can be easily reached after traveling on the road leading to 01 Rangala. Especially if you use this road, you can access this place by enjoying the beauty of the beautiful waterfalls of Huluganga Ella, Sari Ella and Jodu Ella in the Panwila Divisional Secretariat, which is a tourist area of Dumbara valley
Especially during the rainy season, this natural water pool looks very beautiful. Moreover, this place is a very deep place, so you should visit this place with care.
